GET /api.description: Serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: Serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: Serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Serves an object of an article searched by its id

article.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
article.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Serves and array of comments from the same aritcle

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Adds a comment to a specific article

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Updates the vote count of an specific article

GET /api/users.description: Serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: Serves a user object by username

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Updates the vote count of an specific comment

POST /api/articles.description: Adds a new article with specified properties.

request_body.author: string - name of the author
request_body.title: string - title of the article
request_body.article_img_url: string (optional) - URL of the article image (defaults if not provided)

article.article_id: integer - unique identifier for the article
article.author: string - name of the author
article.title: string - title of the article
article.article_img_url: string - URL of the article image
article.votes: integer - number of votes the article has
article.created_at: string - timestamp when the article was created
article.comment_count: integer - number of comments on the article
